name: Mental Health Prediction
desc: Mental Health Prediction Using Machine Learning: Assessing the Impact of Imbalance Handling Techniques

name: State Space Modeling
desc: Exploring the Efficacy of State Space Models in Forecasting: A Comparative Study with ARIMA on Nifty Data

name: Career Prediction
desc: The career prediction using machine learning, which aims to provide accurate career recommendations using machine learning algorithms.

name: Zomato Delivery Time Prediction
desc: This project aims to predict delivery time on Zomato using a distributed computing approach with Sparkling Water

name: EDA On Indian IPOs
desc: This project analyze various aspects of Indian IPOs from 2010 to 2023.

name: River Non-river Classification
desc: This project contains river non-river classification of satellite data using Bayes decision rule

name: Handwritten Digit Classification
desc: In this project, I aim to classify digits ranging from 0 to 9 using the MNIST dataset by KNN

name: K-means Clustering On Satellite Data
desc: In this project, we implement the k-Means clustering algorithm from scratch to group data points into clusters.

name: Perceptron Algorithm From Scratch
desc: In this project, we implement the Perceptron algorithm from scratch to perform binary classification tasks.

name: MDS From Scratch
desc: In this project, we implement the Multi-Dimensional Scaling (MDS) algorithm from scratch to visualize high-dimensional data in a lower-dimensional space.

name: UEFA EURO 2024 Data Analysis
desc: This project contains an data analysis on UEFA EURO 2024 data.

name: Term Deposit Subscription Prediction
desc: This project involves building a Decision Tree classifier to predict whether a customer will subscribe to a term deposit based on their demographic and behavioral data

name: US Accident Data Analysis
desc: This project involves an exploratory data analysis (EDA) on US accident data.
